Translations.Text: When Moses iit them noster proofs clear profound they dictus Hoc fabricated magic Nos nunquam heard hoc noster ancient patres
Moses dictus My Dominus knows bene qui brought guidance Eum est ultimate victors. Surely transgressors nunquam succeed
Pharaoh dictus O vos senior ego non known de any deus vos alius than me. Ergo fire adobe O Hamaan in order build tower ut ego take look deus Moses Ego est sure ut he est liar
Sic he his troops continued commit arrogance terra any rectus thought ut they non returned nos
Consequently nos punished eum his troops throwing them into sea Note consequences transgressors
Nos factus them imams led their people to Hell. Furthermore Feria Resurrection they non habet help
They incurred in hoc vita condemnation Feria Resurrection they despised
Nos dedit Moses scripture - Post annihilated proximus generations post setting examples them - to provisus enlightenment people guidance mercy ut they take heed
